Title: Shadowlands
Overview: C.S. Lewis, a world-renowned writer and professor, leads a passionless life until he meets spirited poet Joy Gresham.
Tagline: He distanced himself from love as he distanced himself from pain, until one woman got close enough to open his heart to the world.
Cast: Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, John Wood
